pullrequest.title: Update windows build scripts for gazebo11

content.raw:
I’ve clean up the variable locally in the machine and the compilation seems to reach gazebo configuration moment.

[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-windows7-amd64/2598/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2598/console)

I’m still working in a proper fix that prevents the pollute of PATH variable.
content.html:
I’ve clean up the variable locally in the machine and the compilation seems to reach gazebo configuration moment.

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2598/console
